messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5700056/diff/1/test/sigchld.go
File test/sigchld.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5700056/diff/1/test/sigchld.go#newcode8
test/sigchld.go:8: // Test that a program can survive the third worst idea added by Berkeley, SIGCHLD.
aren't you the one always telling Russ to stop editorializing?

On Feb 24, 2012, at 11:46 AM, bradfitz@golang.org wrote:

> LGTM
> 
> 
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5700056/diff/1/test/sigchld.go
> File test/sigchld.go (right):
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5700056/diff/1/test/sigchld.go#newcode8
> test/sigchld.go:8: // Test that a program can survive the third worst
> idea added by Berkeley, SIGCHLD.
> aren't you the one always telling Russ to stop editorializing?

i put that there to test that these were being actually reviewed :)

-rob

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b18d4cb1f1d3 ***

test/[n-z]*.go: add documentation

R=golang-dev, bradfitz, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5700056
